sentences.en: A minicomputer is also known as a midsized or low - end mainframe computer.
sentences.cn: 一台小型计算机,也常被称为中型计算机、或低级主机.

sentences.en: Exchangeable disk storage: Refers to disc pack storage used with mainframe computers.
sentences.cn: 可替换磁碟贮存: 指大型电脑用的磁碟组贮存方法.

sentences.en: I write the telephone remote control system mainframe - full source code.
sentences.cn: 俺写的电话遥控系统的主机端完整源代码.

sentences.en: If a problem does occur, a signal is automatically sent to the mainframe.
sentences.cn: 如果真有问题出现，就会有信号自动传送到主机。

sentences.en: It includes basically software design, mainframe and network design, system security design.
sentences.cn: 方案重点包括软件设计 、 主机及网络系统设计和系统安全设计三个方面.

sentences.en: Mainframe, auxiliary machine and dicing machine all apply frequency converted motor.
sentences.cn: 主机 、 辅机、切粒机采用变频电机.

sentences.en: More auto function, and long lifetime of mainframe with better stability.
sentences.cn: 自动化功能更多, 整机寿命以及稳定性能更佳.

sentences.en: Most have slavishly copied the design of IBM'sbig mainframe machines.
sentences.cn: 大多数公司都一味模仿IBM公司大型主机的设计。

sentences.en: Our office micro inter face with the mainframe computer in London.
sentences.cn: 我们办公室的微机与伦敦总计相联接.

sentences.en: People had always thought of IBM as a high end mainframe player.
sentences.cn: 在此之前,人们想到IBM总是想到它的大型的高端大型计算机.

sentences.en: Section 3 provides a detailed description of switch card and mainframe specifications.
sentences.cn: 第3章详细介绍开关卡和主机的技术指标.

sentences.en: That pulse forces the circuit breaker to shut down her mainframe for 30 seconds.
sentences.cn: 这个脉冲能迫使断路器切断它的主机30秒.

sentences.en: The tool is so different between the mainframe remote testing possible.
sentences.cn: 该工具使不同主机间的远距离测试成为可能.

sentences.en: The type of fixed function computer terminals used with IBM mainframe computers.
sentences.cn: 具有固定功能的计算机终端类型,用于IBM大型计算机.

sentences.en: These were the so - called mainframe machines.
This algorithm is developed using ALGOL language on Burrough 7800 mainframe computer.
sentences.cn: 此算法已在Burrough7800机上用ALGOL语言实现.

trans.tran_cn: （大型电脑的）主机，中央处理机，[计] 主机，大型机，总配线架
trans.tran_en: a large powerful computer that can work very fast and that a lot of people can use at the same time
